name: Oath of the Wretch
text:
Oath of the Wretch

A spell in the darkness,
Then placed in the fire.
Amidst all other sentiments
My rage engulfs desire.

Lost among these ember dreams
I sail to-ward the dawn.
Leave this world in screaming hate
And dread the place I've gone.

What whim has set my soul to die,
And serve the night time here?
Cast into the sea of pain
Am imbued with all my fear.

Wretched and beguiled hearts,
The ones who still must breathe.
They too shall reap the Daedric Fire
Of the Everlasting Eve.

I will push off from this horrid place
With my pride and vanity.
And pleasure in the lies I press
Upon your sanity.

So join me now, you judging mass
A people damned by right.
Spend eternity trapped with me,
In my never ending night
